name: Triphala Capsules
contraindications_short: Consult doctor in chronic digestive disease, pregnancy, or post-surgery

name: Ashwagandha Stress Balance Tablets
contraindications_short: Caution in thyroid/autoimmune conditions, pregnancy, and with long-term medications

name: Brahmi Tailam – Head & Hair Oil
contraindications_short: External use only; patch-test for sensitive skin
internal_tags: hair & scalp; vata soothing; evening ritual

name: Joint Ease Herbal Tablets
contraindications_short: People with kidney disease or on multiple medications should consult doctor

name: Calm Evening Herbal Tea
contraindications_short: Not for people with known allergy to ingredients; caution in pregnancy due to licorice

name: Liver Care Tonic
contraindications_short: People with diagnosed liver disease should use only under medical supervision

name: Daily Immunity Churna
contraindications_short: Avoid in acute high fever without medical evaluation

name: Women’s Balance Support Tablets
contraindications_short: Not for use in pregnancy; people with hormone-sensitive conditions should consult doctor
